about_the_game:
MASSIVE UPDATE COMING MAY 1ST 2024 !! THE WILL WILL BE UPDATED TO UNREAL 5.4 ALONG WITH A TOTALLY NEW ANIMATION SYSTEM AND MORE!!

Thanks for your patience while this game gets a complete overhaul.

For people who already own the game the new dodge and melee combat system is now live as a demo and I will have the first version of the complete overhaul live by May 1st. You can follow me on youtube or discord to see the progress!

Welcome to a harsh and unforgiving world, where survival is the only thing that matters. Age of Omens is a medieval fantasy survival game that will test your skills and your wits. With a unique mix of tower-defense and fantasy magic elements, you'll need to plan your defenses, gather resources, and fend off hordes of enemies.

But that's not all - Age of Omens features a revolutionary directional cut, thrust, and parry system for melee combat, where timing and skill are everything. Master this system and you'll be able to take on even the toughest foes.

And it's not just your enemies that you need to worry about. Age of Omens features a full weather system, with changing seasons that can impact your gameplay. Will you be able to survive the harsh winter, or will you succumb to the elements?

Explore a rich and detailed world filled with danger and wonder, and uncover the secrets of the Age of Omens. Are you ready to face the challenge?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for multiplayer
